title: IT Help-desk Admin
text:
JOB BRIEF

The IT Helpdesk Administrator’s role is to provide a single point of contact for end-users to receive support, maintenance and incident requests within the groups ICT environment.

RESPONSIBILITIES

· Provide administrative support to the IT leadership

· IT Helpdesk administration

o Assigning tickets

o Following up with team for outstanding tickets

o Ensure required fields are completed and tickets are assigned to the appropriately skilled team member

o Assist other members of the IT department in troubleshooting tickets

o Ensuring that closed tickets have appropriate information attached

· Conference rooms:

o Ensuring that Conference Rooms IT systems are maintained and in working order

o Ensuring all cables and connectors are supplied to each room

· IT asset register

o Addition of new equipment

o Updating hardware changes

o Tracking server warrantees

· IT component stock control

· Frontline IT support and escalation

· Creation and maintenance of KB articles

· IT procurement:

o Monitor and update IT budget / orders

o Manage and monitor Software subscriptions

· Recruitment:

o Staff on/off boarding information gathering and input

o IT induction for new staff

· IT team coordination - meeting, discussions and planning

· Performs other related duties as assigned
